module.exports = {
  validateArgs: {
    paths: {
        '/foo': {
            get: {
                parameters: [
                    {
                        in: 'query',
                        name: 'foo',
                        type: 'string',
                        required: true,
                    },
                ],
            }
        }
    },
  },
  request: {
    path: 'foo',
    query: {
      foo: 'asdf',
      additional1: 'bbbbb',
    }
  },
  expectedErrors: [
    {
        status: 400,
        code: 'Validation-invalid-query-parameter',
        source: { parameter: 'additional1' },
        title: "The query parameter is not supported."
    }
  ],
};
